examples.translation: He was one of Jesus' apostles.
examples.english_translation: He was one of Jesus' apostles.

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek ἀπόστολος (apóstolos, “one sent forth”), from ἀποστέλλω (apostéllō, “I send forth”).

usage_notes.explanation: 'Apostoli' is the Finnish word for 'apostle,' referring to someone sent on a mission, particularly one of the original twelve disciples of Jesus.
